original_text: You shall die in peace. And as spices were burned for your fathers, the former kings who were before you, so people shall burn spices for you and lament for you, saying, “Alas, lord!”’ For I have spoken the word, declares the Lord.”
korean_text: 평안히 죽을 것이며 사람이 너보다 먼저 있은 네 조상들 곧 선왕들에게 분향하던 것 같이 네게 분향하며 너를 위하여 애통하기를 슬프다 주여 하리니 이는 내가 말하였음이라 여호와의 말씀이니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: And as spices were burned for your fathers,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너의 아버지들을 위해 향품이 불태워졌듯이,

sentences.original_text: the former kings who were before you,
so people shall burn spices for you
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 사람들이 너를 위해 향품을 불태우고

sentences.original_text: For I have spoken the word,
